ygData.msgSnippet: (Alloran2, please state where your three newest Predacons, Ramjet, Skywarp, and Dirge are.  Are they still at where they were fighting Ratchet and BlueStreak

(Alloran2, please state where your three newest Predacons, Ramjet, Skywarp, 
and Dirge are.  Are they still at where they were fighting Ratchet and 
BlueStreak or are they gone?  By the way, I don't mean where their exact 
position, I need to know if they moved or not)

Nemesis Enforcer/Dark One/Pyro/Unitron/Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Punch (Counter 
Punch)/Bumblebee/Scattershot:

::Nemesis turned his head, seeing Dark One and Pyro approach::
"What are YOU doing here?"

::Dark One chuckled::
"Too make sure YOU don't screw UP."

"Yeah, you can't find good help these days." ::Pyro laughed at Nemesis, 
pointing a finger::

==================

::The Human ship that had been badly damaged from space debris (from Koga 
Shuko and Set's craft being hit by asteroids) fell, plummeting into the 
ground 4 miles away from the Alliance base.  The ship, desolated, creaked as 
it's wings smashed into the ground, a whole in the side of the ship blowing 
out, a 7 ft robot emerging, cursing, heading in the direction of the Alliance 
base::

==================

::Bumblebee continued to jog, stopping in bushes as he saw the commotion at 
the Predacon base::
"Hmmm...nothing to offer but my skills...guess it will have to do..." he 
whispered to himself, stepping out of the bushes, arms raised in the air.
"Hold your fire!  I wish to join your cause!" he yelled, to no one particular 
as he scanned across the faces of all the Predacons outside of the Pred base. 
::

=================

::Scattershot, a bald eagle, looked down from 500ft in the air, above the 
Alliance base, noticing the guard outside of it (Zergling)::
"Now, is a chance to prove, I am not utterly useless, to the enemies of these 
robots..." he whispered, his voice almost inaudible as it was drowned out by 
the wing, though he didn't make a move, except flying through the air, soon 
taking a perch on a tree::
"When the time coves of course." he whispered once more.

=================

::Koga Shuko sighed, hearing Set::
<Very well, Set, but you better not let those filthy savages win.  We've 
invested to much in this project.  The energon, Pre-Third Cybertronian War 
technology, and Oblitercons will be ours!>

<Unitron, Anubis, Annhialator, Killer, and Hades, my scanners tell me that 
the forces have retreated back to their bases.  Unitron, Anubis, and Hades 
will accompany me on an attack of an enemy base.  Killer and Annhialator, and 
all other personel will stay here, and defend the base.  I have spoken, 
everyone has five cycles to gear up, meet me outside of the ship.>
::Musing with a thought, Koga Shuko, the wealthy Predacon, took out a 
metallic flask, and a small metal tweezer.  Then Shuko grabbed a laser rifle 
and gattling gun, putting them both in subspace, heading for the designated 
area he ordered his troops to go. ::

--------------------------

::Unitron, Anubis, and Hades all heard Koga Shuko's orders, reloading their 
weapons and waiting in silence as they watched scattered flames burn across 
the battlefield::
